languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт лишь качает головой.{/n} "Не думаю, элантах. Не все в этом мире возможно постичь, сколько бы мы ни старались. И все же мое сердце ликует, ведь я помогла тебе обрести покой. Пусть и на время".

{n}Yrliet just shakes her head.{/n} "I do not think so, elantach. It is impossible to know everything in this world, no matter how much we would like to. And still, my heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт лишь качает головой.{/n} "Не думаю, элантах. Не все в этом мире возможно постичь, сколько бы мы ни старались. И все же мое сердце ликует, ведь я помогла тебе обрести покой. Пусть и на время".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet just shakes her head.{/n} "I don't think so, elantach. It is impossible to understand everything in this world, no matter how much we would want to. And still, my heart sings: I've helped you find peace. Even if it's just for a short while."

{n}Yrliet just shakes her head.{/n} "I don't think so, elantach. It is impossible to understand everything in this world, no matter how much we would want to. And still, my heart sings: I've helped you find peace. Even if it's just for a short while."

{n}Yrliet just shakes her head.{/n} "I do not think so, elantach. It is impossible to know everything in this world, no matter how much we would like to. And still, my heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."

{n}Yrliet just shakes her head.{/n} "I do not think so, elantach. It is impossible to know everything in this world, no matter how much we would like to. And still, my heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."

{n}Yrliet just shakes her head.{/n} "I do not think so, elantach. It is impossible to know everything in this world, no matter how much we would like to. And still, my heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特只是摇了摇头。{/n}“恐怕不行，外界人。无论我们多么渴望，也不可能了解这世界上的一切。不过，能帮助你找到平静，哪怕只是短暂的平静，也足以令我心情雀跃。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet just shakes her head.{/n} "I do not think so, elantach. It is impossible to know everything in this world, no matter how much we would like to. And still, my heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特只是摇了摇头。{/n}“恐怕不行，外界人。无论我们多么渴望，也不可能了解这世界上的一切。不过，能帮助你找到平静，哪怕只是短暂的平静，也足以令我心情雀跃。”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet menea la cabeza.{/n} «No lo creo, elantach. Es imposible saberlo todo en este mundo, por más que nos gustase. Y pese a ello, mi corazón canta de júbilo, pues te he ayudado a encontrar la paz. Aunque solo sea por un instante».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet just shakes her head.{/n} "I do not think so, elantach. It is impossible to know everything in this world, no matter how much we would like to. And still, my heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet menea la cabeza.{/n} «No lo creo, elantach. Es imposible saberlo todo en este mundo, por más que nos gustase. Y pese a ello, mi corazón canta de júbilo, pues te he ayudado a encontrar la paz. Aunque solo sea por un instante».

languages.text: {n}Yrliet secoue la tête.{/n} « Je ne crois pas, elantach. Il est impossible de tout savoir dans ce monde, qu'importe nos efforts. Mais mon cœur chante, car je vous ai {mf|aidé|aidée} à trouver la paix, ne serait-ce qu'un court instant. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet just shakes her head.{/n} "I do not think so, elantach. It is impossible to know everything in this world, no matter how much we would like to. And still, my heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet secoue la tête.{/n} « Je ne crois pas, elantach. Il est impossible de tout savoir dans ce monde, qu'importe nos efforts. Mais mon cœur chante, car je vous ai {mf|aidé|aidée} à trouver la paix, ne serait-ce qu'un court instant. »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Das glaube ich nicht, Elantach. Es ist unmöglich, alles auf dieser Welt zu wissen, so sehr wir uns uns das auch wünschen. Und dennoch singt mein Herz, weil ich Euch geholfen habe, Frieden zu finden. Wenn auch nur für kurze Zeit."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet just shakes her head.{/n} "I do not think so, elantach. It is impossible to know everything in this world, no matter how much we would like to. And still, my heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Das glaube ich nicht, Elantach. Es ist unmöglich, alles auf dieser Welt zu wissen, so sehr wir uns uns das auch wünschen. Und dennoch singt mein Herz, weil ich Euch geholfen habe, Frieden zu finden. Wenn auch nur für kurze Zeit."

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは首を横に振る。{/n}「そうは思わないぞ、エランタ。この世界のすべてを知ることは不可能だ。どんなに望んだとしても。それでも、私の心は歌っている。あなたが平穏を見つける手助けができたのだから。それがほんの束の間だったとしても」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet just shakes her head.{/n} "I do not think so, elantach. It is impossible to know everything in this world, no matter how much we would like to. And still, my heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは首を横に振る。{/n}「そうは思わないぞ、エランタ。この世界のすべてを知ることは不可能だ。どんなに望んだとしても。それでも、私の心は歌っている。あなたが平穏を見つける手助けができたのだから。それがほんの束の間だったとしても」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, yalnızca başını sallıyor.{/n} "Sanmıyorum elantach. Ne kadar istesek de bu dünyadaki her şeyi bilmek mümkün değil. Fakat kısa bir süreliğine de olsa ruhunun huzura erişmesine yardım edebildiğim için içim rahat."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet just shakes her head.{/n} "I do not think so, elantach. It is impossible to know everything in this world, no matter how much we would like to. And still, my heart sings, for I have helped you find peace. Even if only for a short while."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, yalnızca başını sallıyor.{/n} "Sanmıyorum elantach. Ne kadar istesek de bu dünyadaki her şeyi bilmek mümkün değil. Fakat kısa bir süreliğine de olsa ruhunun huzura erişmesine yardım edebildiğim için içim rahat."
